CustomField.description: Calculates a lead score based on status, contact preferences, and lead source.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - Not Converted"), 0, IF(DoNotCall, -25, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Email)), 15, 0) + CASE( LeadSource, "Web", 20, "Phone Inquiry", 35, "Partner Referral", 25, "Purchased List", 10, 0 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A score indicating lead quality. Higher scores represent higher quality leads. Score is 0 if status is Closed - Not Converted.
CustomField.label: Lead Score
